mapper.insert: insert into bi_filebrowse_type ( guid, TYPENAME, apppath, filetype, relationname, synfiletype, tooltype, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid ) values ( #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TYPENAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #APPPATH:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FILETYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #RELATIONNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SYNFILETYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TOOLTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
mapper.update:
update bi_filebrowse_type
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, TYPENAME=#TYPENAME#, apppath=#APPPATH#, filetype=#FILETYPE#, relationname=#RELATIONNAME#, synfiletype=#SYNFILETYPE#, tooltype=#TOOLTYPE#,
where guid = #GUID#
